thread.title: TABLE-James Patterson's 'Red Alert' tops U.S. bestsellers list

author: Reuters Editorial
title: TABLE-James Patterson's 'Red Alert' tops U.S. bestsellers list
text: April 5 (Reuters) - James Patterson's latest crime thriller "Red Alert" topped the U.S. best-sellers list on Thursday. Data released by independent, online and chain bookstores, book wholesalers and independent distributors across the United States was used to compile the list. Hardcover Fiction Last week 1. "Red Alert" - Patterson/Karp (Little, Brown) 2. "The Disappeared" - C.J. Box (Putnam) 3. "Accidental Heroes" 1 Danielle Steel (Delacorte) 4. "The Great Alone" 3 Kristin Hannah (St. Martin's) 5. "To Die but Once" - Jacqueline Winspear (Harper) 6. "Little Fires Everywhere" 6 Celeste Ng (Penguin Press) 7. "The Woman in the Window" 7 A.J. Finn (Morrow) 8. "Before We Were Yours" 9 Lisa Wingate (Ballantine) 9. "The Rising Sea" 4 Cussler/Brown (Putnam) 10. "The Punishment She Deserves" 2 Elizabeth George (Viking) Hardcover Non-Fiction 1. "12 Rules for Life" 3 Jordan B. Peterson (Random House Canada) 2. "Embraced" - Lysa TerKeurst (Thomas Nelson) 3. "Secret Empires" 1 Peter Schweizer (Harper) 4. "Russian Roulette" 2 Isikoff/Corn (Twelve) 5. "This Is Me" - Chrissy Metz (Dey Street) 6. "Dear Madam President" - Jennifer Palmieri (Grand Central) 7. "World of Warcraft Chronicle, Vol. 3" - (Dark Horse) 8. "Am I There Yet?" - Mari Andrew (Clarkson Potter) 9. "I’ve Been Thinking..." 6 Maria Shriver (Viking/Dorman) 10. "Giada’s Italy" - Giada De Laurentiis (Clarkson Potter) (Compiled by Jill Serjeant; Editing by Leslie Adler)
